title: RIOT I HAVE AN IDEA FOR A NEW GAME MODE
body: OK so imagine a game, where every single champion had a random set of abilities from their type.. So all champs would have unknown /random abilities and every single time they hit q,w or e it'll be a different random ability. You could even maybe put the ability types in groups and have it random from a group.. Like melee champs example: Tryndamere can randomly use a poppy q or a yi heal or a vi q sorta thing. Imagine how unpredictable the game mode would be.. Mages, marksmen and supports... All random abilities from their group/type. If it stays in the groups your item build would still be functional (if you're building ap you will still get all ap moves.) I believe it'd be a hectic gamemode!! Just an idea ^.^

Perhaps instead of a random ability every time the ability is activated it's a random ability for the duration of the game. So, for example, you could pick Blitzcrank and end up with Death Sentence (Thresh's Q) or Dredge Line (Nautilus' Q) instead of Rocket Grab (Blitzcrank's Q) for the duration of the game, rather than a random one of the three every time the ability is used. It allows for far more reliable ability use, which is always ideal.

Another point, how specifically would we be classifying abilities? Will they be classified under their effects (so like the example above with Blitz, Thresh and Naut) or will it be based on the champions role (Mage, Marksman, Tank, Fighter, Assassin, Support)?
